verses.name: Job 34:19
verses.text: How much less to him that accepteth not the persons of princes, nor regardeth the rich more than the poor? for they all are the work of his hands.

verses.name: Job 34:20
verses.text: In a moment shall they die, and the people shall be troubled at midnight, and pass away: and the mighty shall be taken away without hand.

verses.name: Job 34:21
verses.text: For his eyes are upon the ways of man, and he seeth all his goings.

verses.name: Job 34:22
verses.text: There is no darkness, nor shadow of death, where the workers of iniquity may hide themselves.
